import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask == 1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = (included_pixels - mean_value) * 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask == 1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = included_pixels - mean_value + 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask != 1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = (included_pixels - mean_value) ** 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask == 1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = (included_pixels + mean_value) ** 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask == 1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = (included_pixels * mean_value) ** 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size

    pixels = np.array(pixels)

    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)

    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)

import numpy as np

def calculate_masked_sub_pixel_variance(block_size, mask, pixels):
    (block_width, block_height) = block_size
    mask = np.array(mask)
    pixels = np.array(pixels)
    included_pixels = pixels[mask == -1]
    mean_value = np.mean(included_pixels)
    squared_diff = (included_pixels - mean_value) ** 2
    variance = np.mean(squared_diff)
    return variance
